# Tender Opportunity – Business and Corporate Management Consulting Services

## Overview
Environment and Climate Change Canada is soliciting proposals for the provision of Evaluation Services Consultants to conduct evaluation projects on an as-needed basis.

## Contract Details
- **Tender Reference #**: CB-397, 39910392
- **Amendment #**: 4
- **Solicitation #**: 5000076624R
- **Publication Date**: April 10, 2024
- **Closing Date**: May 9, 2024, 4:00 PM EDT (Local Time)
- **Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2024
- **Contract End Date**: June 1, 2025
- **Language of Service**: English and French
- **Tender Status**: Expiry (as of May 9, 2024)

## Scope of Service
The Evaluation Branch of Environment and Climate Change Canada requires consultants to conduct evaluation projects. Contracts are to be awarded to qualified consultants (TSPS Holders) for a term of one year, with an option to extend the contract for up to three additional one-year periods on the same terms and conditions.

## Security Requirement
A security requirement is associated with this Request for Proposal.

## Eligibility Requirements
The tender is open to qualified TSPS Holders who meet the criteria outlined in the solicitation document, including the consultant category, security level, region, level of expertise, and contracting entity.

## Pre-Qualification
To be considered for this contract, suppliers must be pre-qualified under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) arrangement. For more information, please contact [SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA](mailto:SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA).

## Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact Alyssa Festeryga at [alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca) or phone (902) 201-4251.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement falls under several international trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), among others.

## Regions of Opportunity
This tender is applicable to Canada.

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR).
